nml_option.name: config_use_riverTagTracers
nml_option.description: if true, the 'riverTagTracers' category is enabled for the run

nml_option.name: config_use_riverTagTracers_surface_bulk_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, surface bulk forcing from coupler is added to surfaceTracerRunoffFlux in 'riverTagTracers' category. True by default because the main function of this tracer group is tracking freshwater fluxes from river runoff

nml_option.name: config_use_riverTagTracers_surface_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, surface restoring source is applied to tracers in 'riverTagTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_riverTagTracers_interior_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, interior restoring source is applied to tracers in 'riverTagTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_riverTagTracers_exponential_decay
nml_option.description: if true, exponential decay source is applied to tracers in 'riverTagTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_riverTagTracers_idealAge_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, idealAge forcing source is applied to tracers in 'riverTagTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_riverTagTracers_ttd_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, transit time distribution forcing source is applied to tracers in 'riverTagTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_riverTagTracers_surface_value
nml_option.description: if true, surface value is computed for 'riverTagTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_riverTagTracers_tracer1_lower_latitude
nml_option.description: The lower latitude bound of rivertag tracer1

nml_option.name: config_riverTagTracers_tracer1_upper_latitude
nml_option.description: The upper latitude bound of rivertag tracer1

nml_option.name: config_riverTagTracers_tracer1_right_longitude
nml_option.description: The right longitude bound of rivertag tracer1

nml_option.name: config_riverTagTracers_tracer1_left_longitude
nml_option.description: The lelft longitude bound of rivertag tracer1

nml_option.name: config_riverTagTracers_tracer2_lower_latitude
nml_option.description: The lower latitude bound of rivertag tracer2

nml_option.name: config_riverTagTracers_tracer2_upper_latitude
nml_option.description: The upper latitude bound of rivertag tracer2

nml_option.name: config_riverTagTracers_tracer2_right_longitude
nml_option.description: The right longitude bound of rivertag tracer2

nml_option.name: config_riverTagTracers_tracer2_left_longitude
nml_option.description: The lelft longitude bound of rivertag tracer2

var.name: riverTagTracer1RiverRunoff
var.description: Concentration of rivertag tracer1 river runoff

var.name: riverTagTracer2RiverRunoff
var.description: Concentration of rivertag tracer2 river runoff

var.name: riverTagTracer1RiverRunoffTend
var.description: Tendency for rivertag tracer1 river runoff

var.name: riverTagTracer2RiverRunoffTend
var.description: Tendency for rivertag tracer2 river runoff

var.name: riverTagTracer1SurfaceFlux
var.description: Flux of rivertag tracer1 through the ocean surface. Positive into ocean.

var.name: riverTagTracer2SurfaceFlux
var.description: Flux of rivertag tracer2 through the ocean surface. Positive into ocean.

var.name: riverTagTracer1SurfaceFluxRunoff
var.description: Flux of rivertag tracer1 through the ocean surface due to river runoff. Positive into ocean.

var.name: riverTagTracer2SurfaceFluxRunoff
var.description: Flux of rivertag tracer2 through the ocean surface due to river runoff. Positive into ocean.

var.name: riverTagTracer1SurfaceFluxSubglacialRunoff
var.description: Flux of rivertag tracer1 through the ocean surface due to subglacial runoff. Positive into ocean.

var.name: riverTagTracer2SurfaceFluxSubglacialRunoff
var.description: Flux of rivertag tracer2 through the ocean surface due to subglacial runoff. Positive into ocean.

var.name: riverTagTracer1SurfaceFluxRemoved
var.description: Flux of rivertag tracer1 that is ignored coming into the ocean. Positive into ocean.

var.name: riverTagTracer2SurfaceFluxRemoved
var.description: Flux of rivertag tracer2 that is ignored coming into the ocean. Positive into ocean.

var.name: riverTagTracer1PistonVelocity
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which tracer1 is restored to tracer1SurfaceRestoringValue

var.name: riverTagTracer2PistonVelocity
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which tracer2 is restored to tracer2SurfaceRestoringValue

var.name: riverTagTracer1SurfaceRestoringValue
var.description: tracer1 is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by tracer1PistonVelocity.

var.name: riverTagTracer2SurfaceRestoringValue
var.description: tracer2 is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by tracer2PistonVelocity.

var.name: riverTagTracer1InteriorRestoringRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which tracer1 is restored to tracer1InteriorRestoringValue

var.name: riverTagTracer2InteriorRestoringRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which tracer2 is restored to tracer2InteriorRestoringValue

var.name: riverTagTracer1InteriorRestoringValue
var.description: tracer1 is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by tracer1InteriorRestoringRate.

var.name: riverTagTracer2InteriorRestoringValue
var.description: tracer2 is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by tracer2InteriorRestoringRate.

var.name: riverTagTracer1ExponentialDecayRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the exponential decay of tracer1

var.name: riverTagTracer2ExponentialDecayRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the exponential decay of tracer2

var.name: riverTagTracer1IdealAgeMask
var.description: In top layer, tracer1 is reset to tracer1 * tracer1IdealAgeMask, valid values of tracer1IdealAgeMask or 0 and 1

var.name: riverTagTracer2IdealAgeMask
var.description: In top layer, tracer2 is reset to tracer2 * tracer2IdealAgeMask, valid values of tracer2IdealAgeMask or 0 and 1

var.name: riverTagTracer1TTDMask
var.description: In top layer, tracer1 is reset to TTDMask, valid values of tracer1TTDMask or 0 and 1

var.name: riverTagTracer2TTDMask
var.description: In top layer, tracer2 is reset to TTDMask, valid values of tracer2TTDMask or 0 and 1
